attributes.action: Sever Diplomatic Relations with the Sudanese Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gillian Gibbons was sentenced toa jail sentance in Sudan for allowing the naming of a toy bear Mohammed.

The sentance she received was out of all proportion to the offence comitted and seems likely to have been motivated by geo-political concerns.

We the undersigned petition the prime minister to apply diplomatic sanctions on the Sudanese government including the immediate cessation of any financial assistance except for humanitarian reasons.

rejection.details: This petition should be reworded now Mrs Gibbons has been released
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
